author: Kamahl
text: I have seen you have been interesned in my old modification Instant Messenger, so I hope, you will also like this MOD <http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=70&t=2008845> and maybe rate it as one of the best ;) Anyway, nice blog :)

author: Mike
text:
The Kiss Portal Engine (although not validated yet but soon) has no validation edits and no XHTML... plus it's the only fully integrated portal for phpBB3...

Other portals only allow block on the purpose built portal page, Kiss allows blocks on all pages including any new page added by mods...

Kiss Engine is a rework of the Kiss Portal (the original portal for phpBB3 2005/2006) and Stargate Portal (2008)... by the same author... Me!
